thread.title: Tom in Florida
thread.title_full: Viking Bags reviewed by Tom in Florida

author: Tom in Florida
title: Tom in Florida
text: This is an outstanding product for a very very very good price. The dealer's OEM bags were $695.00 + $150.00 for the mounting brackets. The Viking bags I bought came to $186.00 delivered and included the hardware for a hard or soft mounting. They are also lockable. They look very nice on my Triumph America. I would recommend Viking to any biker.
